ygData.subject: RE: Adventure vacations levels 12-15 *spoilers*
ygData.msgSnippet: I would reccommend Ular(?) or whatever the centaur is named myself. I found that Krak didn t like me enough to sell to me and the Carrilion didn t seem to work
ygData.messageBody:
I would reccommend Ular(?) or whatever the centaur is named myself. I found
that Krak didn't like me enough to sell to me and the Carrilion didn't seem
to work on him at all. Not to mention that you have to climb all that way to
the top... For ease of reference the centaur pens are at (168, -2430).

Good Journey,

Sineras Silverlyre (Cazic-Thule)


8)-----Original Message-----
8)From: John Kim [mailto:kim@...]
8)Sent: Monday, July 12, 1999 11:06 AM
8)To: eqbards@onelist.com
8)Subject: Re: [eqbards] Adventure vacations levels 12-15 *spoilers*
8)
8)
8)From: John Kim <kim@...>
8)
8)On Mon, 12 Jul 1999 chlebek@... wrote:
8)>
8)> Paw dungeon in south karana -- rarely has more that 10
8)people in it (on The
8)> Rathe at least) and has decent loot. It's actually good
8)(solo or grouped) from
8)> level 6 to 18 or so. The down side is that it is a long way
8)from anything. You
8)> can sell at the gypsies in north karana, but the nearest
8)bank is in qeynos or
8)> highkeep.
8)
8)You can sell at the centaurs roughly due NNE from Paw; or at
8)the aviak village due S from Paw. The aviak vendor is at the
8)very top and the fall can be fatal from that height, so I'd
8)recommend the centaur. Just play your Charismatic Carillion
8)and he should give decent prices.
8)
8)--
8)John H. Kim
8)kim@...
